And our volunteers lead with love so you should feel right at home!  From one of our recepients:  What Community Members Say: \"Una Vida is such a blessing to the Petaluma (and beyond) community. From six food distributions per month and bi-annual clothing drives - the Una Vida team works tirelessly every day to ensure that help & hope is available to those who need it.\"-Sara Caudill     \u00a1Mucho estacionamiento para nuestra distribuci\u00f3n de alimentos! \u00a1Y nuestros voluntarios lo gu\u00edan con amor para que se sienta como en casa!   De uno de nuestros destinatarios: Lo que dicen los miembros de la comunidad: \"Una Vida es una gran bendici\u00f3n para la comunidad de Petaluma (y m\u00e1s all\u00e1). Desde seis distribuciones de alimentos por mes y colectas de ropa bianuales, el equipo de Una Vida trabaja incansablemente todos los d\u00edas para garantizar que haya ayuda y esperanza disponibles. a quienes lo necesitan.\"-Sara Caudill", "notes": "Drive Through available for handicapped only.", "contactName": "Lynne Moquete MPH", "contactPhone": "707-364-0867", "contactEmail": "lynne@una-vida.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside or Drive Through, Walking Through", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Diapers, Fruits & Vegetables, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 59, "regionName": "Redwood Empire Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1f934c90-6fab-4f51-9c97-aef07a96094a.png", "website": "https://refb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Tuesday 4:30 PM-5:30 PM [ 1st, 3rd week(s)]", "Tuesday 4:30 PM-5:30 PM [ 1st, 3rd week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
